document.full_text: a monster tornado killed at least 116 people in joplin, missouri when it tore through the heart of the small city, ripping the roof off a hospital and destroying thousands of homes and businesses.
document.title: tornado devastates joplin, missouri, 116 dead
lines_and_colors: a monster tornado killed at least 116 people in joplin, missouri when it tore through the heart of the small city, ripping the roof off a hospital and destroying thousands of homes and businesses.
